saldo_beschreibung: The balance describes the assets minus all debts. Assets - liabilities = balance
differenz_beschreibung: Only investment bookings for purchases and sales are taken into account. Purchases - sales = difference
neue_buchung_beschreibung: Do you want to enter the account balance change as a new booking?
buchung_löschen_beschreibung: Do you really want to delete the booking?
vermögen_beschreibung: Accounts of the following account type are classified as assets:
schulden_beschreibung: Accounts that have the type credit or have a negative amount are classified as debts.
konto_löschen_beschreibung: Do you really want to delete the account?
konto_löschen_übertrag_beschreibung: Before you can delete the account, you must transfer the remaining amount to another account.
kontoname_existiert_bereits_beschreibung: The account name already exists. Please choose a different name.
budget_löschen_beschreibung: Do you really want to delete the budget?
kategorie_löschen_beschreibung: Do you really want to delete the categorie?
kategoriename_existiert_bereits_beschrei: The category name already exists. Please choose a different name.
kauf_beschreibung: When a new asset is added to your portfolio or increased.
verkauf_beschreibung: When an asset leaves your portfolio or is reduced. Examples of assets: Shares, ETFs, bonds, real estate, cryptocurrencies, ...
aktiv_beschreibung: Active income is income that is generated through the direct use of time, energy and work. With active income, your labor or time is exchanged for money. Examples: Salary as an employee, freelance work, hourly work, ...
passiv_beschreibung: Passive income is a source of income where, after an initial investment of time, money or resources, money can be earned continuously without having to go to work regularly. Examples: Dividends, interest, rental income, ...
fix_beschreibung: Fixed costs are expenses that are incurred regularly and usually only change rarely. Examples: Rent, insurance, subscriptions, loans, ...
variabel_beschreibung: Variable costs are expenses that change depending on how much you consume. Examples: Food, restaurants, movies, energy costs, ...
sprache_ändern_beschreibung:
When changing a language, all texts, start categories and start accounts are translated.
Specially created categories, accounts and bookings are not automatically translated but can be renamed afterwards.
währung_ändern_beschreibung: When a currency is changed, all amounts from bookings and account balances are converted into the new currency. Budget amounts are not converted into the new currency but can be adjusted individually. The currency conversion is carried out at the current exchange rate.
budget_umrechnen_beschreibung: Should budgets also be converted into the new currency?
erste_einführungsseite_text: Keep an eye on all your income, expenses & investments.
zweite_einführungsseite_text: Create monthly budgets and keep an eye on them at all times.
dritte_einführungsseite_text: Keep an overview of all your accounts and investments at all times - simple, clear and organized.
vierte_einführungsseite_text: The app is constantly being developed and improved. Look forward to many more features.
verantwortlich_für_inhalt: Responsible for the content according to § 55 Abs. 2 RStV:
eu_kommission: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution:
online_streitbeilegung_beschreibung: You can find our e-mail address in the legal notice above. We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
feedback_beschreibung: Share your feedback with the developer to improve Moneybook. Feedback, ideas for a new feature, other suggestions, ...
feedback_erfolgreich_gesendet: Thank you very much. Your feedback has been sent successfully.
fehler_erfolgreich_gesendet: Thank you very much. The error has been sent successfully.
fehler_beschreibung: Please provide a detailed error description so that we can analyze the problem in the best possible way and solve it as quickly as possible.
wechselkurs_abfrage_fehlermeldung: The current exchange rate cannot be retrieved. Please check your internet connection or try again later.
internetverbindung_fehler_beschreibung: Please establish an internet connection so that the current exchange rate can be called up.
email_ungültig: Please enter a valid E-Mail address.
